summary: Umberto Maria Durloni is a successful lawyer and a socialite who likes parties and a lavish life. He's got it all, except any ethical qualms.Only a step away from the top, his perfect world... See full summary Â»
cast: Claudio Bisio|Margherita Buy|Diego Abatantuono|Jennipher Rodriguez|Claudio Bigagli|Raul Cremona|Carlo Buccirosso|Laura Baldi|Federico Basso|Marco Bonadei|Alex Cendron|Stefano D'Accordi|Maruti Garikiparthi|Pietro Ghislandi|Carlotta Giannone|Lucia Lisboa|Emma Lo Bianco|Camillo Milli|Luis Molteni|Vasco Montez|Antonio Pauletta|Pietro Sarubbi|Matteo Scalzo|Vittorio Hamarz Vasfi|Massimo Viafora
title: La gente che sta bene
